name: element: app :computer:
description: Problem or suggestion is associated with an Archiv8 application

name: element: community :family:
description: Problem is associated with the community

name: element: doc :ledger:
description: Problem or suggestion is associated with the documentation

name: element: form :scroll:
description: Issue or suggestion is associated with a form

name: element: other :question:
description: Problem or suggestion  is associated with something not covered elsewhere

name: element: package :gift:
description: Problem or improvement is associated with a package

name: element: src :speedboat:
description: Problem may be associated with the upstream source code source code

name: err: dupe :loop:
description: Issue or pull request already exists

name: err: info :ear:
description: Requested information was not received

name: err: no fix :scream:
description: There is no apparent fix

name: err: review :x:
description: Failed to pass code review

name: err: test :biohazard:
description: Changes failed in required tests

name: priority: CRITICAL :clock1:
description: Issue needs addressing as soon as possible

name: priority: LOW :ok_hand:
description: Issue has the lowest priority

name: priority: NORMAL :calendar:
description: Issue can wait but needs addressing before those marked as LOW

name: priority: URGENT :bomb:
description: Issue urgently needs addressing. It has the highest priority

name: status: closed :door:
description: Issue has been closed

name: status: new :phone:
description: This is a new issue

name: status: old :face_exhaling:
description: This issue is old. What should happen next?

name: status: progressing :construction_worker:
description: Work is progressing

name: status: reviewing :eyeglasses:
description: Changes are being reviewed

name: status: stale :ghost:
description: This issue is stale. It has been overtaken by other code changes. What should happen next?

name: status: testing :syringe:
description: Changes are being tested

name: status: triaging :hospital:
description: Issue is being triaged

name: status: upstream notified :potable_water:
description: Working with upstream

name: type: issue :bug:
description: Something isn't working

name: type: issue :bug:
description: Something isn't working

name: type: dependencies :compass:
description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

name: type: outdated :placard:
description: Package is not in sync with the latest upstream release

name: type: request :open_hands:
description: A request

name: type: sec :eyes:
description: There is a security issue

name: type: upstream :potable_water:
description: Issue is upstream

name: wait: more info :hourglass:
description: Waiting for more information

name: wait: need help :loudspeaker:
description: Help is needed to fix the issue

name: wait: review :eyeglasses:
description: Help is needed to fix the issue

name: wait: test :syringe:
description: The fix for this issue is waiting to be reviewed

name: wait: triage :hospital:
description: This issue is waiting to be triaged

name: wait: upstream :potable_water:
description: Waiting for information from upstream
